context.p: CM-Portal allows Admins to create Products.
NOTE: This feature is available only to Admins.

info.p: From the side Menu, click the Products, then Create link.
Enter the details as shown below.

ul.li: Job Type: Select required Job Type from dropdown.
Designation Aliases: Click 'Add Designation Alias' button to add new Alias.
Design Responsible: Org Unit Short Name in Ericsson employees profile (shown in People Finder).
Versioning Scheme: Select a versioning scheme from dropdown.
Admins Signums selected from the dropdown menu will be added to Products admins list. Creators signum will be added automatically.
Users Signums selected from the dropdown menu will be added to Products admins list.
Note:if the signum required cannot be found on the dropdown menu: type the signum then press Enter.

info.p: Click the Save button, the CM-Portal will execute the required operations on Mimer. Success/Failure message will be displayed.
